description: The start command has been issued for the given benchmark generator
test instance, either via CLI or SNMP. The cienaCesBenchmarkEntityEntryPortId
specifies the port under test when the test instance was started;
the s-vid, c-vid and destination mac address used to build the test
packet are also provided.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestStarted CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEntityEntryPortId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntrySvid i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryCvid i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryDstMac x 000eaa12ddff

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Entity port under test
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEntityEntryPortId

description: Unique identifier for the test instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId

description: Unique name given to the test instance at creation time.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName

description: S VLAN ID to use for testing.
For generator test instances, this over-writes the value defined in
the referenced test profile if applicable (encap-type set to qinq).
For reflector test instances, this has to be set to a valid s-vid
accepted by the associated sub-port. A value of 0xFFFF indicates ANY s-vid.
A value of 0 indicates untagged or single-tagged traffic.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntrySvid

description: C VLAN ID to use for testing.
For generator test instances, this over-writes the value defined in the
referenced test profile if applicable (encap-type set to dot1q or qinq).
For reflector test instances, this has to be set to a valid c-vid
accepted by the associated sub-port. A value of 0xFFFF indicates ANY
c-vid, while a value of 0 indicates untagged (s-vid also has to be set
to 0).
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryCvid

description: Destination MAC address to use for generator test instances. When set
this over writes the value specified in the referenced test profile.
This field is not applicable for reflector test instances.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryDstMac

description: The specified generator test instance has been manually stopped by
the user, either via CLI or SNMP, before the testing completed.

event.Summary: Benchmark test '$v4' manually stopped before completion

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestStopped CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Unique identifier for the test instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId

description: Unique name given to the test instance at creation time.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName

description: The testing for the specified generator test instance has finished the
configured number of iterations as configured in the referenced
profile interval and duration.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestCompleted CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Unique identifier for the test instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId

description: Unique name given to the test instance at creation time.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName

description: The throughput test result for the specified generator test
instance is below the specified throughput KPI value for
either the untagged session the given PCP and color traffic.

event.Summary: Benchmark test '$v4' failed Throughput KPI profile '$v12'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestFailedThroughputKpi CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionCurrentPktSize.1.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionThroughputResultsMax.1.1.1.1.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Unique identifier for the test instance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId

description: Unique name given to the test instance at creation time.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName

description: Unique Id of the KPI profile entry
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileId

description: PCP value associated with this entry. Set only
if the KPI is associated with a tagged session
meaning cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged flag is set to false.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp

description: Traffic color, green or yellow, associated with these
KPIs. Set only if the KPI is associated with a tagged session
meaning cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged flag is set to false.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor

description: Packet size in bytes currently used by the running test.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionCurrentPktSize

description: Unique Id of the EMIX sequence entry
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceId

description: Maximum throughput recorded for the given packet size
in Mbps * 100. The value is multiplied by 100 to be able
to send the results as an integer but should be divided
by 100 when displayed to provide a 2 decimal point accuracy.
A result of 123.45 is sent as 12345.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionThroughputResultsMax

description: Flag indicating if this group of KPIs is for untagged traffic
or not. When set to True, cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp and
cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor are ignored. The value of
cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcpIndex and cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColorIndex
are 9 and 1 respectively for untagged KPIs.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged

description: Name of a the KPI profile
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileName

description: Name of this EMIX sequence
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceName

description: The frameloss test result for the specified generator test
instance exceeds the specified throughput KPI value for
either the untagged session the given PCP and color traffic.

event.Summary: Benchmark test '$v4' failed Frameloss KPI profile '$v12'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestFailedFramelossKpi CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionCurrentPktSize.1.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceId.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionFramelossResultsResult.1.1.1.1.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceName s EXAMPLE

KPI value for either the untagged session the given PCP and color traffic.

event.Summary: Benchmark test '$v3' failed Maximum Duration of a Single Outage KPI profile '$v4'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestFailedMaxDurationSingleOutageKpi CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName.1 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileName.1 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionCurrentPktSize.1.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceName.1 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkOutageRecordId.1.1 u 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkOutageRecordDuration u 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: Unique name given to the test instance at creation time.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName

description: Name of a the KPI profile
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileName

description: Flag indicating if this group of KPIs is for untagged traffic
or not. When set to True, cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp and
cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor are ignored. The value of
cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcpIndex and cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColorIndex
are 9 and 1 respectively for untagged KPIs.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged

description: PCP value associated with this entry. Set only
if the KPI is associated with a tagged session
meaning cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged flag is set to false.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp

description: Traffic color, green or yellow, associated with these
KPIs. Set only if the KPI is associated with a tagged session
meaning cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged flag is set to false.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor

description: Packet size in bytes currently used by the running test.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionCurrentPktSize

description: Name of this EMIX sequence
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceName

description: Id of the outage record.
(One less than the record index).
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkOutageRecordId

description: Duration of this outage in micro-seconds.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkOutageRecordDuration

description: The sum of the duration of the recorded outages for the outage test for
the specified generator test instance is above the specified sum of outages duration
KPI value for either the untagged session or the given PCP and color traffic.

event.Summary: Benchmark test '$v3' failed Maximum Duration of the Sum of All Outages KPI profile '$v4'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestFailedMaxDurationSumOutagesKpi CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkTestInstanceEntryName.1 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiProfileName.1 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiUntagged.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiPcp i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkKpiColor i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionCurrentPktSize.1.1.1.1 i 1 CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkEmixSequenceName.1 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-BENCHMARK-MIB::cienaCesBenchmarkGenTestSessionOutageResultsSumDurationRecorded.1.1.1.1 u 1
